description: Detects remote RPC calls to create or execute a scheduled task via SASec Author: Sagie Dulce, Dekel Paz. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Remote Schedule Task Lateral Movement via SASec
query: (EventLog:"RPCFW" AND winlog.event_id:"3" AND InterfaceUuid:"378e52b0\-c0a9\-11cf\-822d\-00aa0051e40f" AND OpNum:("0" OR "1"))
